resources.string: "Enter the address of the Cryptchat server you want to add to continue. The server must be secured with HTTPS."
"Enter a phone number to use in this server. The phone number you use will be visible to all users in the server."
"Expected to receive a registration id, but received \"%1$s\""
The server has sent an SMS to %1$s containing an 8-digits token.\nPlease enter the token below to continue:
"Verification request has failed without a reason. Status code: %1$d"
"You are already registered in this server!"
"This address doesn't appear to be pointing to a Cryptchat server."
"Server responded with a non-200 status code: '%1$d'"
"Image compression was not successful; image upload was not initiated."
"There are no other users besides you on this server"
"If your contact sees on their device the same words as the ones shown on this screen and in the same order, you can be 100% sure that your messages are truly end-to-end encrypted 🔒"
"Backup failed due to an unexpected condition."
"Backup failed due to the following error: %1$s"
"Readonly mode is enabled when a backup process is started."
"Server settings are currently disabled because the app is in read-only mode."
"The application will enter read-only mode which means many capabilities will be disabled such as sending and receiving messages. Continue?"
"Save an encrypted backup of all your conversations and servers, and restore it on another device."

"Taking a backup will enable readonly mode which will prevent this device from receiving and sending any new messages. This is done to ensure that no new messages arrive after you've taken the backup.\n\nYou can disable readonly mode, but it's not recommended to do that if you intend to restore the backup on another device."
"Choose a strong and unpredictable password. Must be at least 10 characters."
"Backup couldn't be created because password was missing."
"Restore a backup you took previously and you will be able to pick up your conversations where you left off."

"Clicking on the \"Start\" button will prompt to select your backup file from your files. Once you've selected your file, you'll be asked to enter the password that you used for the backup encryption.\n\nYou can only restore backups if you've not registered in any servers."
"Restore failed due to an unexpected condition."
"Restore failed due to short Initialization Vector."
"Restore failed because the restored database is corrupt."
"Restore failed because the backup file is corrupt or decryption key is wrong."
"Chat is disabled because the app is in readonly mode"
"The server rejected your message and did not provide a reason."
"The server denied the request due to a client error."
"The server had a problem while processing the request."
"No such host exists. Are you connected to the Internet?"
"Your device appears to be offline at the moment. Please try again when your device is connected to the Internet."
"An encoding error occurred while processing the server response."
"The server unexpectedly responded with a non-JSON response or malformed JSON."
